title: League Installation Failure
body:
I'm trying to install League; however I keep getting an error message. If technical support would help, that'd be great. :)
Below are images which should help with diagnosing this:

https://i.gyazo.com/fd005ed7d71b28b8b3c0c146eb6c2a5c.png
https://i.gyazo.com/c84042e0e3f4319c030d01da5a1563cd.png
https://i.gyazo.com/51c6ee2e60c55cefb38d96290da657d6.png

replies.body:
A Visual C++ 1935 error usually pops up when your initial installation of this component was corrupted. The common fix is to first uninstall all existing versions of Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 on your system, then reboot your PC. You'll then want to ensure [all available windows updates are installed](http://www.update.microsoft.com/), the follow up by installing the correct package [directly from Microsoft](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue!
This has resolved the issue. Thank you very much!

This could stem from not setting up permissions. Let us know if this works.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
